feed.title: Kawartha Lakes (Fenelon Falls) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Kawartha Lakes (Fenelon Falls)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:58 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -6.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 03:00 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -6.9°C
Pressure: 100.8 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -12.1°C
Wind: WSW 24 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow this evening and after midnight. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 5:51 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:51 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Becoming clear overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 20 in the evening then light after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 5:51 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
